Academic bio

I work as a research scientist at NAVER LABS Europe, in computer vision and robotics. I did my Ph.D. at Inria Grenoble and Siléane – a French company where I worked as R&D engineer for 6 years on robotic perception and manipulation for industrial applications. I was advised by Fréderic Devernay, Laetitia Leyrit and James Crowley. Before, I obtained a MSc. degree in Engineering from the École Centrale de Lyon, and a Master of Signal and Image Processing from the University of Lyon.
